articles.description: Galatasaray said they would "initiate criminal proceedings" against Fenerbahce manager Jose Mourinho after claiming he made "racist statements" following the teams' 0-0 draw on Monday.
articles.title: Jose Mourinho: Galatasaray accuse Portuguese of making 'racist statements'

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Sheffield United v Leeds United in the Championship.
articles.title: Sheffield United vs Leeds United: Championship stats & head-to-head

articles.description: After 250 members of staff were made redundant last year, Manchester United announce up to 200 more redundancies to "return the club to profitability".
articles.title: Man Utd redundancies: Up to 200 staff to be made redundant

articles.description: The proportion of home wins in the Premier League is at its lowest outside of the Covid era - but why?
articles.title: Man City 0-2 Liverpool: Why are Premier League teams struggling to win at home?

articles.description: With Mohamed Salah top of the Premier League goal and assists charts this season, BBC Sport looks at how he compares to other great strikers and what records he could break.
articles.title: Mohamed Salah: Is Liverpool striker on course for best individual Premier League season?

articles.description: Batter Joe Root backs "brilliant leader" Jos Buttler and says the England captain is making a better fist of the job than he did at times during his tenure as Test skipper.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025: Joe Root backs "brilliant" England captain Jos Buttler

articles.description: Rachin Ravindra's 112 helps New Zealand reach the semi-finals of the Champions Trophy as they beat Bangladesh by five wickets.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025 results: Rachin Ravindra guides New Zealand to victory over Bangladesh

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on singer and Chelsea fan Paige Cavell with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v singer and Chelsea fan Paige Cavell

articles.description: Spain defender Laia Codina says the squad has become stronger because of their battles both on and off the pitch over the last few years.
articles.title: Laia Codina: Spain players 'stronger' from battles on & off pitch

articles.description: George Russell says he is "optimistic" that Mercedes "can have a decent season" in 2025 as the team launch their new car.
articles.title: Mercedes launch 2025 F1 car: George Russell says W16 E 'a good step forward'
